Why does Open Office 2 not sorrect spelling, do I need to install dictionaries myself?
look at writing aids and select your lang then make sure autocorrect is on
there is a macro file for installing dic if you need them DicOOo-1.5.5.sxw

which language you need

tools>options>writing aids> then set your language and dict there

go to open office websit and download this file a macro file for installing dic if you need them DicOOo-1.5.5.sxw. It is not installed by default either and will take care of all dic and thesua for you
